products.title: Faux Suede Mercury Roman Blind
products.description: This classic grey roman blind has an attractive suede finish and will add a stylish and elegant feel to any room in your home. Our luxury side control chain headrail system allows quick and easy installation. Combine with contrasting curtains or simply use it on its own for a perfect crisp finish to your windows. Very much on trend, the mercury grey blind will bring a touch of luxury to your home at a fraction of the cost compared to high street prices.

products.title: Malta Silver Grey Roman Blind
products.description: A feel for velvet at a fraction of the cost. The malta collection comes in a variety of greys and natural colourways, perfect for todays interiors. The silver-grey colour is perfect for the contemporary home or mix it up with curtains for a more traditional look. Pleasing to the eye, and great to touch the malta range adds a touch of class to your home interior. All of their roman blinds are made here in their own west yorkshire factory by their skilled workforce.

products.title: Faux Suede White Roman Blind
products.description: Create a spacious and chic interior with their white faux suede roman blind. Their faux suede deluxe range of fabric has proven to be one of their most popular fabrics for roman blinds and curtains. Still, at the forefront of fashion, this fabric makes sumptuous roman blinds and curtains to enhance your home interior. This blind is great at creating contrast but is also fantastic on its own creating that minimalist look highly sought after in todays living.

products.title: Urban Metallic Cream Roman Blind
products.description: Urban comes in several modern grey and cream shades, this hopsack range adds modern simplicity to your kitchen or bedroom. Urban tales on a metallic appearance the light hits the fabric, adding more depth to this textured fabric. Their lightest shade in the urban range, urban cream brings a light and airy feel to your room. Combine with wooden accessories for a modern earthy finish. Product id: db-rom0973 fabric colour: metallic cream material: 100% polyester lining: light filtering poly/cotton blended lining headrail: durable white headrail with top or face fix brackets.

products.title: Urban Metallic Limestone Roman Blind
products.description: Urban comes in several modern grey and cream shades, this hopsack range adds modern simplicity to your kitchen or bedroom. Urban tales on a metallic appearance the light hits the fabric, adding more depth to this textured fabric. A medium grey shade, urban limestone allows the addition of a soft grey-toned fabric without being too dark or over-bearing. Perfect for retaining a light and airy theme whilst adding some colour.

products.title: Hopsack Mercury Roman Blind
products.description: One of their most popular blinds, the hopsack mercury roman blind is favoured by all. Simple with a rustic feel, the hopsack mercury blind is on point with current home fashion trends. Greys are most certainly in for todays contemporary home. This classic grey roman blind and its attractive textured finish, will add a stylish and elegant feel to any room in your home. Quality is important to us, and we want to make sure we offer you a luxury product at affordable prices, this is why all of their products go through a final quality check and comes complete with a five-year guarantee product id: db-rom0692 fabric colour: mercury material: 100% polyester lining: light filtering poly/cotton blended lining headrail: durable white headrail with top or face fix brackets.

products.title: Malta Cream Roman Blind
products.description: Malta is one of their most popular fabric collections. Malta mid cream is a stylish choice. An elegant shade, perfect for pairing with wooden tones within the home. This fabric is beautiful within living rooms or dining rooms especially when paired with their blackout lining. Their made to measure roman blinds are all handmade within the uk and will provide a touch of luxury to your interior styling.

products.title: Hopsack Clay Roman Blind
products.description: Simple with rustic textures the hopsack clay roman blind is one of their true best sellers. Offering a simple solution with a traditional weave for both the classical and contemporary home. Very much in style with a collection designed around a natural colour pallet, you will find that this blind will enhance your interior and give your windows a fresh and modern look. All of their hopsack roman blinds are made here in their own west yorkshire factory by their skilled workforce.

products.title: Flutter Sheer White 89mm Vertical Blind
products.description: Flutter is a fluffy feathered sheer pattern in shades of white and creams. Perfect for a room where you want to introduce a subtle texture and give a bright, clean look. Product id: db-vtb1191 fabric colour: white sheer material: 100% polyester headrail: white slimline headrail supported by white steel brackets - top or face fixable slat width: 89mm slat material: 100% polyester control type: smooth chain operation with cord tilt or wand tilt and pull energy saving rating: er2 - medium energy saving value - effective thermal retention light filtering: yes flutter sheer white 89mm vertical blind in white.

products.title: Verona Prime 25mm Titanium Perfect Fit Venetian Blind
products.description: Their range of verona 25mm perfect fit aluminium venetian blinds blend simplicity with functionality, and are perfect for the office - home or away. A stylish grey tone, this titanium perfect fit venetian blind adds a bold grey shade to your home. Match with other grey tones for a modern style, or mix with wood accessories for a chic finished look. Perfect fit blinds are designed for use with a upvc door and window as they are drill, and screw-free.

products.title: Jurassic Blackout Marine Roller Blind
products.description: This whimsical dinosaur themed print is a treat for any room. With dino silhouettes on a stylised scenic background, the jurassic marine blackout roller blind is quirky, contemporary and ideal for all ages. Presented in on-trend tones of turquoise, blue and grey, this pollergen treated blackout roller blind is a fun and stylish way to carry a favourite theme throughout a space. Product id: db-rbx1959 fabric colour: marine material: 100% polyester lining: white backing headrail: durable aluminium roller tube supported by white steel brackets - top, face or side fix control type: smooth continuous-looped chain energy saving rating: er3 - highest energy saving value - uv protection and effective thermal retention blackout: yes jurassic blackout marine roller blind in blue/green/multicoloured.

products.title: Wonderland Blackout Pastel Roller Blind
products.description: Block pastel shades and cute, contemporary graphics come together to create the whimsical appeal of the wonderland blackout roller blind. This design is utterly charming with muted, on-trend colours that can be so easily and stylishly accessorised. The blackout and pollergen treated fabric is ideal for enhancing the element peace and comfort in a childs bedroom. Product id: db-rbx1967 fabric colour: pastel material: 100% polyester lining: white backing headrail: durable aluminium roller tube supported by white steel brackets - top, face or side fix control type: smooth continuous-looped chain energy saving rating: er3 - highest energy saving value - uv protection and effective thermal retention blackout: yes wonderland blackout pastel roller blind in yellow/pink/blue/multicoloured.

products.title: Unishade Blackout Fr Atmosphere Duck Egg 127mm Vertical Blind
products.description: Offering complete light blockage & resistentance to moisture. Their stunning unishade range has been designed specifically with office & work environments in mind. The collection includes everything from subtle muted shades to well satured bright colour options. products.title: Zambezi Cloud Real Wood
products.description: Their premium zambezi painted cloud real wood blind features a soft grey painted finish, great for adding polished simplicity into a room. From soft creamy neutrals to trending greys and stone shades, this real wood range adds a modern sleek finish to your windows. A shade that never goes out of trend, this grey wooden blind would adds a modern feel at a great price. At swift direct blinds, we take quality seriously.

products.title: Amazon Acacia Real Wood
products.description: Their premium amazon acacia real wood blind is a stunning warm mid grey shade, great for incorporating subtle earthy shades within the home. From soft stained brown, painted creamy neutrals to textured fine grains, this real wood range creates a natural chic finish to your windows. Product id: sdb-wsb0562 fabric colour: acacia material: bass wood headrail: high quality headrail with top or face fix brackets and matching pelmet slat width: 50mm slat material: stained finish control type: co-ordinated raise & tilt dual cords with matching toggles energy saving rating: er2 - medium energy saving value - effective thermal retention light filtering: yes amazon acacia real wood in grey.

products.title: Verona Prime 25mm Aluminium Perfect Fit Venetian Blind
products.description: Their range of verona 25mm perfect fit aluminium venetian blinds blend simplicity with functionality, and are perfect for the office - home or away. A classic grey shade, this aluminium perfect fit venetian blind adds an refreshing look to your home. Match with other grey tones for a modern style, or mix with wood accessories for a chic finished look. Perfect fit blinds are designed for use with a upvc door and window as they are drill, and screw-free.

products.title: Euphoria, Coral - Roller Blind
products.description: Euphoria coral brings a lively mix of contemporary colour to the party, and allows you to add that artistic finishing touch you've been looking for at the same time. The pinks and reds work in perfect harmony with the darker shades to add depth and subtlety to your decor like never before. Add coral to the kitchen, and give yourself the extra spark of inspiration you need to create a culinary feast unlike any other.

products.title: Entity, Coral - Roller Blind
products.description: When you're looking for the perfect combination of retro patterning and contemporary colour, entity coral is the fabric that you've been waiting for. The smooth lines work in perfect harmony with the gentle coral colouring that gives this design its name. Add entity coral to the living room, and match it with some retro geometric wall art. That way you can extend the theme around the room, and it will only take half an hour to really bring it to life.

products.title: Love Is All Around - Roller Blind
products.description: When it comes to a design that will make you smile the moment you walk in the door, they don't come any more compelling than love is all around. The contemporary styling and mixtures of gently faded electric colours is just what you need to add some life and vitality to your chosen space. Matching to love is all around is a decision between choosing your favourite shade from the fabric, or going in your own direction and adding a faded mint green.

products.title: Crown Dark Silver Vertical Blind
products.description: This verical blind is perfect for adding a layer of style to your window without compromising on quality. Being dimout and with a uniqu patern running up each vane, these blinds are great in any window. Keep your blinds looking their best with this easy to wipe clean fabric, just use a damp cloth to wipe away any dirt or stains. This blind can be made upto 400cm wide - much wider than all other blinds on the market so that you can cover your largest window without comprimising on style.
